channel.title: BakeScape (AllStar Base)
channel.description:
[center][b][i][u]Welcome To BakeScape!![/u][/i][/b] A brand new server [i]teeming[/i] with classic, yet modern elements.
[u][b] Staff Positions Available:[/b][/u] - Mod & Admins (Must be loyal to server and forums) - Possible Co-owner/Coder - Web/Forum Maintenance (Comes with Admin Status)
* The server is always a work in progress. Please, at any time give suggestions and ideas to further the development of bakescape. Viva la 317's
[u][i][b][url=http://bakescapehome.webs.com/]***Play the webclient here***[/url]
[url=http://bakescapehome.webs.com/client.jar/]**Download client here** (Be sure to rightclick and save as a .jar)[/url][/b][/i][/u]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/BZIETVc.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/qjmwtIh.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/SwvA9S9.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/FormoJp.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/sQaKeiG.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/K39TZM3.png[/img]

item.title: BakeScape (AllStar Base)
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

why is the client download show up as a “file” instead of a “jar”

Read full topic

item.title: BakeScape (AllStar Base)
item.dc:creator: @Fireweaver0 Fireweaver0
item.description:
@Fireweaver0 wrote:

I’m a jackass, the webclient was not functioning before, but now it is. So that’s fixed.

I was thinking of incorporating some sort of trivia game that awards players money or items. Possibly a point system or something.
I need more minds to collaborate with, or a lot of weed.

Oh and there is weed references, just use the webclient

Read full topic

item.title: BakeScape (AllStar Base)
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

I’d want to see something unique, Fireweaver. That’s what draws players to servers.

Read full topic

item.title: BakeScape (AllStar Base)
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

I am surprised. I was expecting something to do with weed because of the name.

Read full topic

item.title: BakeScape (AllStar Base)
item.dc:creator: @Fireweaver0 Fireweaver0
item.description:
@Fireweaver0 wrote:

+1 for the both of you not being dicks.

I also agree with what you guys say, I do need to make improvements, but I may need another coder because to be honest I get high a lot. Whilst high I tend to slack on certain things.

Definitely find those glitches for me though, that’s actually much appreciated.

Edit: Tell me what would make you guys want to play the server?

Read full topic

item.title: BakeScape (AllStar Base)
item.dc:creator: @ReaperXScape ReaperXScape
item.description:
@ReaperXScape wrote:

Loveandpower:

As much as I enjoy allstar you are going to have to show what you have done to make this worth playing

[size=12pt]–I agree–[/size]
i don’t think you have added enough to this server yet, that people will actually play i wish you good luck, i think im going to join and find glitches for you.

Read full topic
